data.title: Snoop Dogg Presents The Joker’s Wild®
data.meta_description: Based on the popular Snoop Dogg-hosted version of the classic television game show that aired on TBS and TNT, Snoop Dogg Presents the Joker’s Wild game on Everi’s larger-than-life sign package, the Renegade 3600™, brings the chart-topping hip hop artist to casino floors with laid back, Snoop-inspired bonus features.
data.text:
Based on the popular Snoop Dogg-hosted version of the classic television game show that aired on TBS and TNT, Snoop Dogg Presents the Joker’s Wild game on Everi’s larger-than-life sign package, the Renegade 3600™, brings the chart-topping hip hop artist to casino floors with laid back, Snoop-inspired bonus features. Players will dig the Beat the Devil bonus which is magnified on the enormous reels above the bank with a chance to land large credit prizes and increasing multipliers.

GAME OVERVIEW

Game Type: Video

Class Availability: Class III, Class II, Lottery - WA

Reels: 5

Lines: 30

Min/Max Bet: 50/500

Approval Date: Q1 2020

Progressive: LAP, WAP

Preferred Denom: 1¢

Available Denoms: 1¢

Multi-Denom Available: No

GAMEPLAY

Beat the Devil Bonus

Bonus plays out on huge reels above the bank showcasing large credit prizes and increasing multipliers all with signature Snoop interaction!

Snoop's Pick Bonus

The Pick Bonus brings Snoop-brand humor and a game show vibe to the player as they watch their multipliers and wins increase!

Mini Reels Symbol

Frequent Mini Reel symbols on the reels offer plenty of chances to win prizes, bonuses, and progressive awards at all bet levels!

Nudging Wilds

When a wild lands in any position on a reel, it will nudge to cover all positions on that reel, giving players more opportunity for big wins.

GAME DOCUMENTS

Game documents are available for registered users.

Please request an account or login.
